measurements_data.comments: Food/organic includes vegetable and food (80.24 percent), bones and fishbones (0.27 percent), and feathers and coconut shells (0.07 percent) waste; yard/garden/green includes wood; other includes rags, textiles, jute (2.08 percent), medicine and chemicals (0.13 percent), sand, silt, ceramics (0.91 percent), soil and ash (5.04 percent), and miscellaneous (0.43 percent) waste
